name: Disciple Tools Facebook Integration
upgrade_notice: BREAKING CHANGES!!!!!! If you are currently using v0.1.2, upgrading this plugin will stop the integration until you configure the cron job. Instructions will be on the extensions settings page.
author: Disciple Tools

sections.description: Disciple Tools Facebook Integration Plugin extends the Disciple Tools system with Facebook integration.
sections.installation: (Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin. Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.
sections.changelog:
Switch from webhooks to using cron jobs. 
 The old webhook strategy had several problems duplicated webhooks would run in parallel and some webhooks would never be received. The new strategy relies on a 5min cron job to pull any new messages. - Save facebook conversations as comments in the 'facebook' tab on the contact. - Select the user to assign new contacts to for each page. -first time running the integration will import all conversation into D.T
